captions.text: Such a lovefool

Even if I look at myself 
Even if I look at myself

Even if I look at myself 
Even if I look at myself
Such a lovefool

Even if I look at myself 
Even if I look at myself

Even if I look at myself 
Even if I look at myself

I heard about you 
through a friend

I can’t control my expressions 
What do I do

I used to say that I’d 
be fine without you

Where is the Byunghoney 
that used to say that
Does she have a boyfriend?

Does she still live there? 
(Why are you so curious?)

Yeah, what’s wrong with me?
Why am I like this
Why am I like this
We met over a year

After numerous fights 
you and me Goodbye
I’m going to let you go

I was happy to turn 
my back(oh still good~)

A day or two was fine 
I met friends too

Played all day and 
getting drunk felt good

But why am I in front 
of you house again

Such a lovefool ohoh
Such a lovefool

I let a good person go 
And now I’m regretting it

My friends look 
at me and say
It has to be her for you

Such a lovefool 
lovefool lovefool

Why am I like this? 
Am I that much a love fool?

Where is my pretty babe who 
used to say “Baby You honey”
Not here any more

I act miserable all day 
When it rains I’m even more pitiful

I know I shouldn't be like this 
But I miss you so much

I can’t fall asleep 
and in a dark night
I walk thinking about you

I remember that road 
that I took you home
Makes me smile

Thinking if you’re still 
well and coming back

Oh my god How is this happening 
I see I shouldn't have come

I should have slept, 
what’s happening

Such a lovefool ohoh
Such a lovefool

I let a good person go 
And now I’m regretting it

My friends look 
at me and say
It has to be her for you

Such a lovefool 
lovefool lovefool

What should I do 
What should I really do
Some one stop me
Someone stop me

Even if I ask my friends 
or people on the street

The answer is 
always the same

Such a lovefool ohoh
Such a lovefool

I let a good person go 
And now I’m regretting it

My friends look 
at me and say
It has to be her for you

Such a lovefool 
lovefool lovefool
Such a lovefool

Even if I look at myself 
Even if I look at myself

Even if I look at myself 
Even if I look at myself
Such a lovefool

Even if I look at myself 
Even if I look at myself

Even if I look at myself 
Even if I look at myself
Such a lovefool

The thing is, a May comeback seems logical with the way the tour is 
planned. Something big is happening in May, since there are no concerts at 
that time. Europe is in April and Taiwan is in June, that leaves May. 
Perhaps that's when Changjo's movie will be out, or maybe there's a 
comeback, but something big and secretive is happening in May.

comments.text:
With the power of Krowdpop, fans successfully requested Teen Top to be in 
Toronto, Canada by showing a high social demand. The next stage that 
Toronto fans need to accomplish is show that social demand in Krowdpop 
ticket sales. When the the goal of $150,000 in Krowdpop ticket sales is 
reached, Teen Top is guaranteed to perform in Toronto on April 3rd 2014!

It is all up to the fans to make the Teen Top concert happen in Toronto. 
Attend and share this event to spread the word about bringing Teen Top to 
YOUR city!

Toronto fans have until February 28th 2014 (11:59 EST) to reach the 100% 
goal.

Purchase Krowdpop tickets here: 
http://krowdpop.com/campaigns/teen-top-toronto﻿
